== Platform ==
== Platform ==
â
The main objectives of the association is to work towards a political system based on genuine democracy and social justice. The first step on this road is to ensure basic guarantees of free and fair elections involving all the Egyptians so that there is an equal opportunity for all the Egyptians to run and win any elections, whether legislative elections or the presidential election. The National Association for Change platform is:
+
The main objectives of the association is to work towards a political system based on genuine [[democracy]] and [[social justice]]. The first step on this road is to ensure basic guarantees of free and fair elections involving all the Egyptians so that there is an equal opportunity for all the Egyptians to run and win any elections, whether [[Elections in Egypt|legislative elections or the presidential election]]. The National Association for Change platform is:
# Ending the [[state of emergency]]<ref name="National Association for Change...A bet on the Egyptians people">[http://www.shorouknews.com/ContentData.aspx?id=206650 National Association for Change...A bet on the Egyptians people]</ref>.
# Ending the [[state of emergency]]<ref name="National Association for Change...A bet on the Egyptians people">[http://www.shorouknews.com/ContentData.aspx?id=206650 National Association for Change...A bet on the Egyptians people]</ref>.
